articles.author: Pablo Elizalde
articles.title: Russian karter loses racing licence over alleged Nazi salute - Motorsport.com
articles.description: The Italian Automobile Club has revoked the racing licence of Russian karter Artem Severiukhin following the controversy over his alleged Nazi salute on the podium of a European championship event.
articles.content:
Severiukhin, 15, was accused of showing a Nazi salute after winning a round of the FIA Karting European Championship at Portimao in Portugal over the weekend.
Motorsport's ruling body, the FIA, anno… [+2063 chars]

articles.author: Leah Dolan, CNN
articles.title: Award-winning photos capture Dutch communities frozen in time - CNN
articles.description: Dutch photographer Ezra Böhm has been named Student Photographer of the Year for his series "The Identity of Holland," which documents the traditional communities that choose to wear historic European outfits.

articles.title: Defence Force confident 'ageing' Hercules aircraft can cope with Europe deployment - RNZ
